page.title: 14MOORLAND AND FORDGATE PAGE1
page.content: To the south of Westonzoyland lie the villages of Moorland & Fordgate.In 1981 a new village hall was built in Moorland to serve the people of both villages.The old hall was knocked down and the new built on the same site.Somerset C.C.& Sedgemoor D.C. gave a grant to help towards the cost but the villagers had to raise thousands of pounds themselves.They held all sorts of fund raising events. The Hall is now used by all the people of the two villages.There is a Playgroup,a Badminton Club,a Youth Club,A Gardening Club,and a Club for older people.As wee as these regular meetings there are often coffee mornings,and Dances held by groups. The Hall is run by a Committee of Representatives from all the groups in the villages.This year it was awarded the Prize for the best Villate Hall.
